content: twirly q scarf a simple knits design this crocheted instructions version of a popular ch100 or more for a longer scarf don t make your knit curly scarf starting chain too tight pattern is fast and easy to crochet with row 1 double_crochet in the 3rd chain from the hook and in at least 160 yards of a each chain to the end of the row turn 98 sts dk/light worsted weight yarn row 2 increase ch3 and double_crochet in the same st work 2dc in each double_crochet to the end of row turn 196 sts the orange and white scarf pictured here row 3 & 4 repeat row 2 two more times 392/784 was made using 164 sts yards of a boucle type yarn premier yarns if you have extra yarn you can work an extra repeat babe a synthetic here to add more twirl to the scarf blend with a size h 5 mm crochet hook row 5 even ch3 half_double_crochet or double_crochet in each stitch across 784 sts you can use any weight and type of if you have extra yarn you can work an extra repeat yarn you like choose of row to add more width to the scarf a hook size that is recommended for the yarn weight you choose cut yarn pull end out of last stitch weave in ends make your scarf smaller or larger by varying the number of chains at the beginning if you have more i hope you try this out have fun yarn you can make your scarf wider by working an extra repeat of row 2 or an extra repeat of row 5 materials 164+ yards dk/light worsted weight yarn crochet hook size h 5 mm yarn needle size 3 wide x 54 long key chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet st s - stitch es © 2008 vicki mikulak all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only questions simple knits@yahoo com revised 7/10/2020
